mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We aim to expose students to different concepts and fields within computer science to help them discover their interests and passions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To not only provide a platform for students to apply their knowledge and skills to real world problems, but also spread our knowledge to the farther reaches of the community.

strategy.title: Our Strategy
strategy.description: Initiate projects, workshops and competitions to expose club members to various technologies, concepts and ideas.
